definition: to help/to assist/mutual assistance/to rush into or up/to raise or hold up/high/tall/old variant of 欀/chariot horse (old)/change (old)

sentences.english: You're no better, you stupid S. O. B.
sentences.chinese: 你也好不到哪裏去，你這狗孃養的笨蛋。

sentences.english: He went to his neighbour to beg for some milk to feed the motherless baby.
sentences.chinese: 他找街坊鄰居討了一些牛奶來餵養那個沒孃的孩子。

sentences.english: Your husband of sum Niang is a grab from other people.
sentences.chinese: 你額孃的丈夫是從別人手中搶去的。

sentences.english: Her black hair has turned gray and her face is wrinkled,” reads the introduction to Feng’s online album dedicated to his mother, Yu Hualing, 46, who supported Feng’s education.
sentences.chinese: 孃的黑髮已慢慢灰白，皺紋也爬上了她的臉龐。

sentences.english: Did the sonofabitch at least get lousy grades?
sentences.chinese: 這狗孃養的至少該有個糟糕的學業吧？

sentences.english: Today, I was robbed by a guy wearing a ninja turtle costume.
sentences.chinese: 孃的，我今天被一個穿着忍者龜服裝的人給打劫了。

sentences.english: This paper discusses woman Du s love tragedy from the sexual perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本文從性別視角對杜十孃的愛情悲劇加以論述。

sentences.english: Are you motherfuckers ready for the new shit?
sentences.chinese: 你們這些狗孃養的準備好接受新的狗屁了嗎？

sentences.english: The website that of his woman is business of this domain name certainly has flaw.
sentences.chinese: 他孃的必訂是這野域實商的網坐有漏洞。

sentences.english: In 10 days I'll have us a war with the son of a bitch, .
sentences.chinese: 在10天內，我就會和那些狗孃養的俄國人開戰，。

sentences.english: Mei Niang"s educated feminist novels remarkably embodied a striking feminist self-consciousness."
sentences.chinese: 梅孃的知識女性小說中凸顯出鮮明而自覺的女性意識。

sentences.english: The motherless children were starved of affection.
As a woman writer in the colonized Northeast China, Mei Niang owns her own unique literary style .
sentences.chinese: 作爲東北淪陷區女作家，梅孃的創作獨具風格。

sentences.english: Say, is this big Ye beating the bottom of Niang?
sentences.chinese: 難道說，這位大爺，在打孃的屁股？

sentences.english: Where the fuck is all this water coming from?
sentences.chinese: 這些水都他孃的從哪裏來的？

sentences.english: “Yeah, ” he tells me “and look at the poor motherfucker.
sentences.chinese: “是啊，”他跟我說，“瞧這可憐的狗孃養的。

definition: youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
wife of the last ruler of the Xia dynasty
see 娭姐[ai1 jie3], father's mother/granny (dialect)/respectful form of address for older lady
dialectal or obsolete equivalent of 媽|妈[ma1]/Taiwan pr. [ma1]
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
(modal particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la1])
(old) grandfather/polite address for an elderly man, or a woman's father-in-law/(Taiwanese) grandfather
(dialect) don't/must not/(contraction of 不 and 要)
